title: Spyder Auto Installation: 2009-2013 Ram 1500 Projector Headlights
description:
This is a complete video walkthrough tutorial of how to install a set of Spyder Auto Projector Headlights with either LED or CCFL halo rings on a 2009-2012 Dodge Ram or Ram Trucks Ram 1500. This complete guide will walk you through the entire process of installing a set of Spyder Projector Headlights from start to finish. These headlights fit both Dodge and Ram Trucks brand Ram models.
 
This video not only demonstrates how to install the product but also shows off what the lights look like installed and what kind of cut-off line can be expected from the projectors used in this quality Spyder lighting product.
tags: Spyder Headlights, projector headlights, Dodge Ram, how to install, spyder lights
